figure_1: Factors affecting the transport of substances between BBB and tumor cells.
figure_2: Signal transduction cascades are involved in cell cycle proliferation.
figure_4: Illustration of a dual-targeting system for brain tumors and transport through BBB. The delivery system function to penetrate through BBB (first barrier) and subsequently target brain tumor cells (second barrier).
figure_5: Distribution of HSA nanoparticles and c/m-HSA nanoparticles in glioma-bearing mice (left, upper = after 24 h of intravenous injection; and right upper = ex-vivo image of the brains excised after 24 hours) adapted with permission from (Byeon et al., 2016).
